mapper.insert: insert into tbl_story_file (file_system_name1, file_original_name1, story_number, file_system_name2, file_system_name3, file_original_name2, file_original_name3) values(#{fileSystemName1},#{fileOriginalName1},#{storyNumber},#{fileSystemName2},#{fileSystemName3},#{fileOriginalName2},#{fileOriginalName3})
